txt.en: 'With Ongdrágh dealt with, the forces within Anglach will fall into disarray. I thank you for your assistance.'

'Reports have come in that enemy forces are gathering within Anglach. Ongdrágh, Master of the Mines, has returned to rally the Captain of the Pit's remaining soldiers. They must be quelled before they become a greater threat to our mission.\n\n'When you are ready, I will direct you to Anglach.'
'There is no time to waste. The enemy's forces swell within Anglach. Are you prepared to depart?'
Many foes await those who dare enter Anglach, the Great Foundry.
Defeated Ongdrágh, Master of the Mines
Defeat Ongdrágh, Master of the Mines
Ongdrágh, Master of the Mines can be found deep within Anglach.\n\nYou should defeat Ongdrágh, Master of the Mines.
Candúr can be found at the Udûn Foothold.\n\nYou should return to Candúr and apprise him of your efforts.
